mods.abstract: The championship boxing squad made Ripley's Believe It or Not for its wins in 10 different divisions. Standing (L-R): Charles Coburn, Marlin Johnson, Joe Sheridan, Fred Hartz, Breen Bland, Hughey Gannon, Al Bronw, John Cassaretta, Ralph Gagliano, Henry Cummings, Paul Luckett, Coach Milo Solomito. Seated (L-R): Peewee Chandler, Larry Huffman, Jimmie McWillie, Ralph Turley, Garland Liles, Pete Catanzaro, Vince Tuminello.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
